startLocation.address: Between the intersection of New Road and Rajini Road Phra Nakhon, Bangkok

name: Grand Palace Tour
summary: Exploring Bangkok's must-see prominent landmark, the Grand Palace
description: Embark on a tour to visit the marvelous Grand Palace and explore its grounds which feature one of the most well-known temples in Thailand, Wat Phra Kaew, or Temple of the Emerald Buddha. Learn about the history behind the Emerald Buddha, and then treat yourself to some shopping at Gems Gallery. The Emerald Buddha sits atop an elegant gold altar in the center of the temple. It is a rather small, dark statue, just over 2-feet (61-cm) tall and made of jadeite. Despite its national importance, Wat Phra Kaew is the only temple in Thailand that doesn’t have any resident monks.

startLocation.address: Khao Lak Village, Takua Pa, Takua Pa District, Phang-nga, Thailand

name: Similan Islands Snorkeling
summary: Snorkeling trip to 4 of the picturesque Similan Islands
description: Discover breathtaking sights and diverse marine life in the beautiful Similan Islands. Enjoy a day in the splendor of one of the world's top diving and snorkeling sites, with clear blue water, rich coral, colorful marine life, and sandy beaches. Appreciate the scenery as you make your way to your first snorkeling spot at Koh Payu. Spend some time at the beach and explore the underwater world before proceeding to the pristine Princess Bay. Stop for a lunch break with authentic Thai cuisine on the serene sandy beach of Princess Bay.

startLocation.address: Talat, Mueang Surat Thani District, Surat Thani

name: Angthong Marine Park
summary: Cruise by speed boat through the Marine Park with 42 islands
description: Spend the day in the emerald jewel of the Gulf of Thailand on a speed boat tour to Angthong Marine Park from Koh Samui. Start the day off with a light breakfast and a 45-minute speed boat ride through the 42 islands. Spend the rest of your day snorkeling the colourful coral reefs and kayaking in the idyllic oasis of the park. Visit the viewpoint of Koh Mae Ko island for an amazing view of the crystal lagoon and the stunning rock formations towering above the archipelago.

startLocation.address: 68 Moo 2, Thepkasattri Rd Kohkaew, Muang, Phuket, 83000, Thailand

name: Phi Phi Islands
summary: Excursion via speedboat to the pristine Phi Phi Islands
description: Enjoy a day of sightseeing in the Phi Phi Islands, a hotspot in Southern Thailand made famous by the movie The Beach. Admire stunning views and the crystal-clear waters of the Maya Bay, enjoy lunch, spot limestone cliffs, and get a chance to go snorkeling. Visit Phi Phi Ley, the smaller, but more famous, of the two Phi Phi Islands. At Maya Bay, you can relax on the sand, go for a swim and explore the beautiful surroundings of spectacular hills and mountains. Following Maya Bay you will see Pi Leh Cove, which is a lagoon-like private pool, and Viking Cave, which is where swifts make their nests and wall paintings feature boats resembling Viking ships. Then, as you pass Monkey Beach, try to spot wild monkeys from the speedboat. Upon arriving at Phi Phi Don, the larger of the two main Phi Phi Islands, enjoy a delicious international buffet lunch and have time relaxing on the beach.

startLocation.address: Naret Damri Alley, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan, 77110, Thailand

name: Elephant Watching Tour
summary: Watching elephants roaming free in Kui Buri National Park
description: Seize the opportunity to see Thailand's national animal and one of the gentlest creatures in the world on this elephant-watching tour. At Kui Buri National Park, observe majestic elephants in their natural habitat and get a chance to see the other fantastic animals and the plant life of the region.

locations.description: Kui Buri National Park - Wildlife Area (อุทยานแห่งชาติกุยบุรีของแท้)

startLocation.description: Chiang Mai City Arts & Cultural Center
startLocation.address: Prapokkloa Rd, Tambon Si Phum, Mueang Chiang Mai District, Chiang Mai, 50200, Thailand

name: Local Cultural Tour
summary: Experience Northern Thai culture with khantoke cuisine
description: Come enjoy an evening out in a truly Northern style setting at a traditional Khantoke Dinner, one of a must-do-and-enjoy dining experience once you are in Chiang Mai. At dinner, your meal will be served on special, low, circular tables called toke presenting various kinds of delicious Northern Thai dishes.

startLocation.address: 68 Moo 2, Thepkasattri Rd Kohkaew, Muang, Phuket, 83000, Thailand

name: Cave Canoeing Tour
summary: Explore Phang Nga Bay's gorgeous caves by canoe
description: Explore the limestone caves around Phang Nga Bay with an experienced guide and learn about their discovery by John Gray in 1989. Travel by specially-made inflatable canoe as you duck into low-hanging ledges and uncover hidden worlds on this thrilling water-bound adventure.

startLocation.address: Koh Rok Yai Island coast, Andaman sea

name: Scuba Dive Tour
summary: Thrilling scuba diving experience. Gardens of soft, vibrant coral & rainbow-colored fishes
description: Enjoy a full day speedboat tour from Koh Lanta, Krabi to explore the fantastic Koh Rok and Koh Haa. Discover two of the most magnificent snorkeling spots at Mu Koh Lanta Marine National Park. Spend the day sunbathing on the amazing white sandy beaches and swim among colorful tropical fish and coral reefs.

startLocation.address: Ranong, Talat Nuea, Mueang Phuket District, Phuket 83000, Thailand

name: White Water Rafting
summary: Drive through beautiful scenery from Phuket to Tone Pariwat
description: Discover the Ton Pariwat Wildlife Sanctuary on this full-day excursion. Combine an exciting whitewater rafting adventure with an exhilarating ride in a 4-wheel-drive vehicle through the rainforest, finishing with a delicious Thai lunch at a local restaurant.
